name: Vessel For Souls
description:
V4S - is a 3d retro oldstyle shooter based on high speed hard gameplay.  Use a lot of abilites guns to kill other demons!
Awesome soundtrack, incredible bloody gameplay and a lot more things!

you lose health every second in combat, replenish them with the picking up souls

The game still in development, So I wait for your feedback:)


DISCORD: https://discord.gg/XHNKg2q
